noun.description: A kind of soft-woven fabric, typically made of wool or cotton and slightly milled and raised.
A small piece of toweling used for washing oneself.
Bland fluent talk indulged in to avoid addressing a difficult subject or situation directly.
examples: a simple admittance of ignorance was much to be preferred to any amount of flannel

origin: Middle English: probably from Welsh gwlanen woolen article, from gwlân wool.
